title: TRANSFORMERS: Galactic Trials
description:
Stop Nemesis Prime as an Autobot or Decepticon. Roll out for an intense fusion of arcade racing and robot combat in TRANSFORMERS: Galactic Trials! Evil NEMESIS PRIME has stolen the Prime Relics that bestow incredible powers on whoever possesses them. Sky Oceans: Wings for Hire Now the AUTOBOTS and DECEPTICONS are in an explosive race to recover these powerful artifacts â€“ which side will you fight for? Compete in a frenetic fusion of racing and combat.
Choose your character from icons like BUMBLEBEE, MEGATRON, and OPTIMUS PRIME, and speed into action on ten battle-race circuits. Level up and customize 11 iconic Transformers. Pull off sick drifts, charge your way through Boost Pads, and build up your Energon meter as you try to outpace your rivals.
